mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_table ( u_id, name, password, address, tel, email, photo, reg_date, user_role, seller_role, del, sr_id ) VALUES ( #{u_id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{photo}, now(), #{user_role}, 'n','n', #{sr_id})
mapper.update: update user_table set name=#{name}, password=#{password}, address=#{address}, tel=#{tel}, email=#{email}, photo=#{photo} where u_id=#{u_id}
update user_table set sr_id=#{sr_id} where u_id=#{u_id}
update user_table set del='y' where u_id=#{u_id};
update user_table set seller_role = 'w' where u_id = #{u_id}
update user_table set seller_role = 'y' where u_id = #{u_id}
update user_table set seller_role = 'n' where u_id = #{u_id}
mapper.select: select * from user_table order BY reg_date desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.update: update user_table set del=#{del} where u_id=#{u_id}
mapper.select: select u_id from user_table where name=#{name} and tel=#{tel}
